text: Need Reagan Rogers for IKEA campaign. Budget around $1,597, looking for 3 x 2-minute tutorial, 1 x Behind-the-scenes content, 1 x LinkedIn post, 1 x TikTok video, 1 x Podcast guest. 3 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 4 months.
